WorkItem.ClosedComment: Right now AutoMapper does not support un-flattening like this.  This should really be a configuration error, you cannot configure anything but members on the configured type, not members on other types.
WorkItem.Description: I found another bug concerning mapping nullable types with AutoMapper.  I'm using the latest release (r87).  It looks like simple mappings work correctly with nullable types, but mappings from a nullable property on one class to a property of a nested class in the target class does not work.  I've attached a simple NUnit test fixture to demonstrate the bug.
